Hello :)

Well I haven't watched NHK Shinsengumi but I really want to, though 
in Turkey it's hard to find those.

But from RK and PMK, my fav chars are...

Okita Souji (Soushi, Soujirou..Hm). Because he is so cute, and his 
story is so sad. Who would deserve a death at his 25? And all of his 
actions, jokes, the optimistic life..And all..you know what I mean :)

Yamazaki Susumu . Mostly because he is hot on PMK..lol..

Hijikata Toshizou, his real romantic personality hidden in his demon 
self. The poems? They are just my favourite..lol..

And from what I have read about NHK, Okita-Hide was so cute..

And..The comedy trio..My fav.
Shinpachi, Heisuke and Sano!
I found out most of the info about Shinpachi and Sano but can someone 
tell me why Heisuke died? Hmm..
